title: markinaz
author: markinaz
content: So, I watch Goodwill auctions as once in a while there is an interesting item.   Here are 9 Ballet cards for one price.  I don't need this many, so I figured I would share on the forum if anyone is interested:https://shopgoodwill.com/item/182580378Thanks!Mark

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: I feel like I saw this exact picture on a twitter post this week where a guy declined to buy them all for $50 because they were not loaded. I offered them the sale for that price but they were unavailable a day later? I believe I originally paid around $85 for a 5 pack of the red unloaded 5K pure cards, FWIW. edit:https://twitter.com/DigibyteMe/status/1720268457080484141

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: geophphreigh on November 05, 2023, 02:41:25 PMI feel like I saw this exact picture on a twitter post this week where a guy declined to buy them all for $50 because they were not loaded. I offered them the sale for that price but they were unavailable a day later? I believe I originally paid around $85 for a 5 pack of the red unloaded 5K pure cards, FWIW. edit:https://twitter.com/DigibyteMe/status/1720268457080484141you are correct - I responded to the tweet that had them as well. I doubt you paid $85 for 5 unless there was some sale, they were typically $35 ea as a single or $30 each if bought in a 5 pack. $85 would have been $17 ea

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 05, 2023, 03:03:20 PMQuote from: geophphreigh on November 05, 2023, 02:41:25 PMI feel like I saw this exact picture on a twitter post this week where a guy declined to buy them all for $50 because they were not loaded. I offered them the sale for that price but they were unavailable a day later? I believe I originally paid around $85 for a 5 pack of the red unloaded 5K pure cards, FWIW. edit:https://twitter.com/DigibyteMe/status/1720268457080484141you are correct - I responded to the tweet that had them as well. I doubt you paid $85 for 5 unless there was some sale, they were typically $35 ea as a single or $30 each if bought in a 5 pack. $85 would have been $17 eaMy spread sheet says they were $16.83.I looked back and my purchase order was for one 5-pack at $99 with a 15% off coupon for "Children's Day" on May 30, 2022. Making the 5 pack $84.15, so $16.83 each.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: geophphreigh on November 05, 2023, 03:15:44 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 05, 2023, 03:03:20 PMQuote from: geophphreigh on November 05, 2023, 02:41:25 PMI feel like I saw this exact picture on a twitter post this week where a guy declined to buy them all for $50 because they were not loaded. I offered them the sale for that price but they were unavailable a day later? I believe I originally paid around $85 for a 5 pack of the red unloaded 5K pure cards, FWIW. edit:https://twitter.com/DigibyteMe/status/1720268457080484141you are correct - I responded to the tweet that had them as well. I doubt you paid $85 for 5 unless there was some sale, they were typically $35 ea as a single or $30 each if bought in a 5 pack. $85 would have been $17 eaMy spread sheet says they were $16.83.I looked back and my purchase order was for one 5-pack at $99 with a 15% off coupon for "Children's Day" on May 30, 2022. Making the 5 pack $84.15, so $16.83 each.  ahh well i was pricing it as they were normally - didnt know you used a coupon code or bundled them. you got a good deal sir!
